sentences.sContent: Drugs helped to relieve the pain.
A secretary was hired to relieve her of some of the administrative work.
sentences.sCn: 一个秘书被雇来为她减轻一些行政工作的负担。

sentences.sContent: ...What does the speaker say helps relieve the symptoms of common headaches...
...But the real truth is that we don't know enough to relieve global warming...
...Retailers can relieve the headaches by redesigning store layouts...

synos.tran: 解除，减轻；使不单调乏味；换…的班；解围；使放心

trans.tranOther: to reduce someone’s pain or unpleasant feelings
